dpInst.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the DA2 Driver Installer!
dpInst.welcomeIntro: This wizard will install DA2 drivers.
dpInst.installHeaderTitle: Installing the software for your DA2 device...
dpInst.finishTitle: Congratulations! You are finished installing your DA2 device.
dpInst.finishText: VCP drivers are now installed for your FTDI DA2 device.
